roleset.name: preserve in chemicals or memory
roleset.note: EMBALM-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from embalm.01-v)

role.descr: Preserved in or with what? Instrument or Manner

example.name: Cadavers
example.text: [Their bodies]-1 are then embalmed *-1 and shipped to schools.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: It was a mark of great might if they took the head of an enemy they admired, embalmed it in cedar oil and kept it as a prized possession.
